content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) 
-  Burner inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Stone furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0) and steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5)
Consists of transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5) and transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

### Pipe group system at position(x=107.5 y=-34.5)
Consists of pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5) and pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)

### Belt group system at position(x=40.5 y=-83.5)
Consists of belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5)


### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are not fueled
-  Make sure to provide fuel to entities that require it, such as burner mining drills and boilers
### Errors when entities are not connected
-  Ensure that entities that require connection, such as steam engines, are properly connected to the rest of the system
### Errors when entities are not plugged into the electric network
-  Make sure that entities that require electricity, such as the electricity group, are properly plugged into the electric network
### Errors when entities are waiting for source items
-  Ensure that entities that are waiting for source items, such as burner inserters, have a steady supply of items to process
### Errors when entities have no ingredients
-  Make sure that entities that require ingredients, such as stone furnaces, have a steady supply of ingredients to process


### NAMESPACE
*   Utility functions: 
    *   `get_entity_status(entity)`: Returns the status of a given entity
    *   `get_entity_position(entity)`: Returns the position of a given entity
*   Important variables: 
    *   `entities`: A list of all entities in the system (type: list)
    *   `entity_statuses`: A dictionary mapping entities to their statuses (type: dict)
    *   `entity_positions`: A dictionary mapping entities to their positions (type: dict)
